name: Intergalactic Package service
description: “Intergalactic Package service”, or “IPS”, is a strategy game set in space. The player is working for IPS and has to create an efficient and cheap transport route for the company’s packages. To do this he can move planets and their gravitational field. He can also use other features to achieve his goal, such as black holes and the package’s speed when sent to space from the start planet. As soon as the package arrives safely at its destination, the player will be able to move on to the next level. The score is based on the amount of tries he needed to complete the level and the amount of gravity fields the player used, which shows how courage is being rewarded in “Intergalactic Package Service”.
